set(THIS_PROJECT zlib)

project( ${THIS_PROJECT} )

#START-FILE-LIST
# File List auto generated by waf2cmake.py, do not modify manually.

set (SourceGroup_Root
	../../SDKs/zlib-1.2.8/adler32.c
	../../SDKs/zlib-1.2.8/compress.c
	../../SDKs/zlib-1.2.8/crc32.c
	../../SDKs/zlib-1.2.8/crc32.h
	../../SDKs/zlib-1.2.8/deflate.c
	../../SDKs/zlib-1.2.8/deflate.h
	../../SDKs/zlib-1.2.8/gzclose.c
	../../SDKs/zlib-1.2.8/gzguts.h
	../../SDKs/zlib-1.2.8/gzlib.c
	../../SDKs/zlib-1.2.8/gzread.c
	../../SDKs/zlib-1.2.8/gzwrite.c
	../../SDKs/zlib-1.2.8/infback.c
	../../SDKs/zlib-1.2.8/inffast.c
	../../SDKs/zlib-1.2.8/inffast.h
	../../SDKs/zlib-1.2.8/inffixed.h
	../../SDKs/zlib-1.2.8/inflate.c
	../../SDKs/zlib-1.2.8/inflate.h
	../../SDKs/zlib-1.2.8/inftrees.c
	../../SDKs/zlib-1.2.8/inftrees.h
	../../SDKs/zlib-1.2.8/trees.c
	../../SDKs/zlib-1.2.8/trees.h
	../../SDKs/zlib-1.2.8/uncompr.c
	../../SDKs/zlib-1.2.8/zconf.h
	../../SDKs/zlib-1.2.8/zlib.h
	../../SDKs/zlib-1.2.8/zutil.c
	../../SDKs/zlib-1.2.8/zutil.h
)


# Support unity build with uber files
set(NoUberFile ${SourceGroup_Root}  )


set (SOURCES
	${NoUberFile}
)
#END-FILE-LIST

if (WIN32 OR DURANGO)
ADD_DEFINITIONS(-D_CRT_SECURE_NO_WARNINGS)
ADD_DEFINITIONS(-D_CRT_NONSTDC_NO_DEPRECATE)
endif()

if (ORBIS OR DARWIN OR LINUX)
MESSAGE( "ORBIS" )
ADD_DEFINITIONS(-DHAVE_UNISTD_H)
endif()


include_directories( ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} )
#include_directories( ${SDK_DIR}/expat-2.1.0/lib )

add_library( ${THIS_PROJECT} STATIC ${SOURCES})

#USE_MSVC_PRECOMPILED_HEADER( ${THIS_PROJECT} "StdAfx.h" "StdAfx.cpp" )

SET_PLATFORM_TARGET_PROPERTIES( ${THIS_PROJECT} )
